scripts.say: After a few quick skirmishes, the Sirens' reinforcements ceased coming, and the sea turned still once more.
As the two searched for a way to exit the Mirror Sea, the fog before their eyes cleared up almost as quickly as when it formed.
It's almost like the fog itself is a part of the abnormal weather within the Mirror Sea.
Looks like we aren't out of the Mirror Sea yet...
Countless islands appeared before them, and massive artificial structures rose high up above in the far distance.
Upon closer inspection, the islands' flora and the structures appear to be made out of innumerable blocks.
It all looks like a poor replica of the real world in their eyes.
The Sirens' technology never ceases to amaze...
Zuikaku, the weather around us just changed again. It's looking like we'll need to explore the area to find a way out.
I mean, that was pretty obvious to me from the moment we wandered in here.
... You're not afraid of what might happen?
It's fine, we'll get outta here sooner or later. We don't achieve anything by worrying about what we don't know.
And while we're here, might as well investigate to see what the Sirens are planning!
